name: The Haunting of Pearls Point Manor
name_original: The Haunting of Pearls Point Manor
description: Two cousins travel down the roads of a quaint, coastal town called Pearls Point. Their destination: the abandoned manor that sits on the edge of the bluffs. Their purpose: to steal any possessed objects they might find in order to turn a profit in a very unique black market. However,  this house may prove their greatest challenge yet.
